page.title: 14HOME LIFE AT TEVIOTHEAD
page.content: A TYPICAL DAY IN THE LIFE OF A HOUSEWIFE IN TEVIOTHEAD DISTRICT: 7.00 AM{BREAKFAST}MADE,AFTERWARDS, HOUSE CLEANED, EVENING MEAL PREPARED, BAKING DONE AND FIRES RELAID. 12.30 PM{LUNCH}IS TAKEN,AFTERWARDS, CORRESPONDENCE IS ATTENDED TO, HOUSEHOLD CHORES AND GARDENING ETC. ARE DONE. 6.30 PM{DINNER}IS TAKEN,AFTERWARDS, REFRESHMENTS IN LOUNGE OR WATCH T.V. 10.30 PM BED THROUGHOUT THE DAY PHONE CALLS ARE ANSWERED AND FRIENDS AND TRADESMEN CALL.SHOPPING IS A CAR JOURNEY TO HAWICK 10 MILES OFF. EQUIPMENT IN DAILY USE:ELECTRIC COOKER ,OIL FIRED STOVE,MICROWAVE OVEN, WASHING MACHINE, DISHWASHER,FOOD MIXER ,REFRIGERATOR,DEEP FREEZE, VACUUM CLEANER,TOASTER AND OPEN COAL FIRE.
